function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven distribution of vaccination","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and mutation, higher mortality rates in underserved populations","Mitigation":"Implementing a fair distribution system, prioritizing vulnerable groups, and addressing disparities","Technologies":"Data-driven allocation algorithms, cold chain logistics, and tracking systems","People":"Underserved populations, older persons, high-risk individuals, people with co-morbidities","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations, and NGOs"},{"Description":"Vaccine hesitancy","Impact":"Slower achievement of herd immunity, increased transmission of the disease, and ongoing public health risks","Mitigation":"Culturally tailored communication, community engagement, and robust pharmacovigilance to address concerns and build trust","Technologies":"Data analytics for tailored messaging, social media monitoring, and adverse event monitoring systems","People":"General population, especially in low-income and high-income countries","Owner":"Health authorities, community leaders, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Intellectual Property Rights and affordability","Impact":"Limited access to essential vaccines, potentially hindering global vaccination efforts and disease control","Mitigation":"Negotiating IP rights, increasing production capacity, and enhancing affordability through global partnerships","Technologies":"Biotechnology for vaccine development, manufacturing automation, and cost-effective production methods","People":"Global population, especially in low-income countries","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, and pharmaceutical companies"}]}
